name: Halloween smasher
description:
The Halloween is arrived and so it also brought monsters with it.Get ready to defend your home as a mob of monsters is about to invade your town! Those  creatures are back, and it's up to you to keep them brainless. Use your finger to tap on the monsters to smash and eliminate them before they break down your door.

How to Play:
- Simply touch the Monsters to kill them
- Use the special power-ups wisely
